name: Kimbo Kush
description: Kimbo Kush, named for the late Kimbo Slice, is a beautifully flavorful indica-dominant hybrid with a lineage that is fruity and stunning. A cross between Blackberry Kush and Starfighter, this strong parentage offers a heavier than average Kush experience, leaning closer to a full indica buzz with every puff. Starfighter supplies Kimbo with a touch of citrus and a brightness that illuminates the thoughtful elements of its Kush genetics. Enjoy this strain at the end of the day, as it can have potent relaxing effects that might give you the 1-2 punch K.O. Kimbo Slice was known for.
descriptionPlain: Kimbo Kush, named for the late Kimbo Slice, is a beautifully flavorful indica-dominant hybrid with a lineage that is fruity and stunning. A cross between Blackberry Kush and Starfighter, this strong parentage offers a heavier than average Kush experience, leaning closer to a full indica buzz with every puff. Starfighter supplies Kimbo with a touch of citrus and a brightness that illuminates the thoughtful elements of its Kush genetics. Enjoy this strain at the end of the day, as it can have potent relaxing effects that might give you the 1-2 punch K.O. Kimbo Slice was known for.

highlightedReviews.text:
So this strain not only smells amazing, it is completely exceptional. By far the most powerful I have had so far yet since getting my MMJ card, I was having such an intense focus and head rush followed by extreme giggling and relaxation. This strain takes about 3 minutes to hit you like a train, and will drive you sky high all while making your head feel like a bowling ball. I recommend this strain to anybody that's overly confident in their tolerance- or anybody with a high tolerance that is looking for pain relief. 
Also S/O to Dabz AZ 24/7 delivery as well for giving me this strain, they were the only place that had it and they not only delivered at an insanely fast time period but the quality was just magnificent.

Named after the one and only Kimbo Slice, this strain will kick your ass in the best way possible. I smoked this at about 7:30pm and it instantly put me in a triangle hold of chillness. I refused to tap and carried on through 2 more rounds. That's when I was hit in the face with a spinning backhand of total relaxation, followed by an upper cut of pure bliss, I was out cold in the 3rd. Perfect body high with a mellow euphoric buzz. Smoke late at night.

articles.title: The 2015 NorCal Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Lisa Rough
articles.text:
There was some beautiful competition at the NorCal High Times Cannabis Cup this past weekend and we were there to cover all of the action. Among all of the hubbub and hoopla, here are the winners of this year’s 2015 NorCal Cannabis Cup:
 
CANNABIS FLOWER WINNERS

Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Schlemons by The Source Genetics
2nd Place: Super Silver Haze by Life is Good
3rd Place: Super Glue by Vallejo Patients Care
 
Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Zkittles by 3rd Gen Family
2nd Place: Kosher Kush from DNA by Greenwolf Los Angeles and Cali Kush Farms
3rd Place: 24K OG Kush by Strain Collective with Pearl Pharma
 
Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Orange Crush by Cannabiotix
2nd Place: Tahoe Chem by C.R.A.F.T.
3rd Place: Chiquita Banana by Utopia Meds – Santa Cruz
 
Best CBD Cannabis Flower
1st Place: CBD OG by C.R.A.F.T.
2nd Place: Doctor Cookies by Northstar Holistic Collective
3rd Place: Sunkiss CBD by California Growers Guild
 
CANNABIS CONCENTRATE WINNERS

Best Sativa Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Citrix #4 by Gold Coast Collection with Apothecary 420
2nd Place: Purple Tangie by Zeinstein Gardens & Loudpack Extracts
3rd Place: Double Tangie Banana by Crockett Family Farms
 
Best Indica Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: AHHS Brand OG by Alternative Herbal Health Services
2nd Place: Banana OG by Crockett Family Farms
3rd Place: Crown OG Live Resin by Prime Extractions
 
Best Hybrid Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Emperors Mandarins “Shatter” by the Kind Center with Unregistered Extracts
2nd Place: Emperors Mandarins by Greenwolf Collective X Cali Kush Farms
3rd Place: Crown OG x Dab Vader OG Zombie Resin by Crown Genetics
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash Products
1st Place: Kimbo Kush Cubantech Drysift by Cubanhashqueen with Exotic Genetix
2nd Place: Cookies & Cream Cubantech Drysift by Exotic Genetix
3rd Place: Peaches ‘N Cream by Full Flava Extracts with E.T. Extracts
 
CANNABIS-INFUSED EDIBLE WINNERS

1st Place: Dark Chocolate Macaroons by Utopia Meds
2nd Place: Pineapple Delight Bites by Lifted Edibles
3rd Place: Cinnamon Maple Tree Hugger – Om Edibles & Gold Drop Collaboration
 
CANNABIS TOPICAL WINNERS

1st Place: Crown OG “It’s the Balm Haling Salve” by Crown Genetics
2nd Place: Honey Pot Bear Butter by Honey Pot with Pure Joy Collective
3rd Place: Absorb CBD Topical Relief by Absorb with Seasonal Apothecary
 
HIGH CBD PRODUCT WINNERS

Best High CBD Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Goji D.C. Live Resin by Moxie Genetics
2nd Place: ACDC by Scapegoat Genetics
3rd Place: ACDC by Dankman Extrax
 
Best High CBD Cannabis Edibles
1st Place: Raw CBD Sipping Cacao by Om Edibles All Female Collective
2nd Place: Beezle’s CBD Brulee – Chocolate Orange by Beezle Extracts
3rd Place: CBD/THC Honey by Baked Beez with the W.E.E.D. Studio City

articles.title: The 2015 DOPE Cup Winning Cannabis Strains, Concentrates, and Edibles
articles.author: Will Hyde
articles.text:
Over the 420 holiday weekend, DOPE Magazine celebrated their 4th annual DOPE Cup at 7-Point Studios in Seattle. The celebration was sponsored by Leafly and showcased some of the region’s best cannabis flower, concentrates, edibles, topicals, glass artists, and accessories. Even a last-minute venue change couldn’t stop the stream of cannabis lovers from overflowing the state fair-themed event that came complete with infused cotton candy, a mechanical joint to ride, magicians, performers, artists, and more. Honestly, the only thing missing was a medicated corn dog to combat my munchies.
As expected, the dab bar was the hive that everyone was buzzing around, with a variety of solvent and solventless concentrates to sample from some of the best extract artists in the area. The highlight had to be local artist Scott Deppe’s crystal skull piece that sat at the X-Tracted bar and captured every passer-by with its intricate design and whopping 6-figure price tag. Those who weren’t concentrated around the dab rigs were busy sampling edibles, entering raffles, and relaxing with a massage at one the topical company booths.

A judge’s pass to the event allowed visitors to join the action by sampling each of the strains entered into the People's Choice category of the Cup. For $99, the judge’s pass gave ticket-holders a half gram sample of all 10 anonymous strains and the opportunity to vote for their favorite. The mystery strains all had amazing flavors, ranging from sweet and tropical to earthy and piney, which made it all the more difficult to choose a favorite.

So, without further ado, here are the DOPE Cup winners!
 
Flower Winners

 
People's Choice Flower

Winner: CPC or Cotton Purple Chem by Hesperides Gardens (Strain #4)
 
Judges' Choice Flower

Winner: The Sauce by ExoticGenetix (Strain #6)
 
Best Indica

Winner: Cascadia Kush by Hesperides Gardens
Runner Up: The White from Cannabis Club by Freak UV Nature
 
Best Sativa

Winner: Matanuska Thunder Fuck by TJ's Gardens
Runner Up: Head Cheese from Cali Connection
 
Best Hybrid

Winner: Peppermint Cookies by GoldLeaf Gardens
Runner Up: GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) by Rain City Cannabis & Top Shelf
 
Highest THC

Winner: The White (29.9%) by Solstice
Runner Up: DT-13 (28.7%) by Patient 99 Care
 
Highest CBD

Winner: ACDC (18.05%) by Loaded Soda
Runner Up: ACDC x Charlotte's Web (17.02%) by B-EZ and Fweedom
 
Concentrate Winners

 
Best BHO – THC
Winner: Marmalade (94.36%) from Platinum Extracts
Runner Up: Private Reserve OG (83.73%) from The Bakeréé
 
Best BHO – CBD

Winner: Sour Tsunami (83.7%) from Solstice by Refine
Runner Up: Sour Tsunami (74.08%) by Stoney Extracts
 
Best CO2 – THC
Winner: Mixed Berry (48.56%, 110 ppm) by Evergreen Extracts
Runner Up: Death Star (69.09%, <10 ppm) by Happy Cats – CO2 Organics
 
Best CO2 – CBD

Winner: ACDC x Remedy (78% CBD, <10 ppm) by Loaded Soda – CO2 Organics
Runner Up: Evergreen Extracts (42.81% CBD, <10 ppm)
 
Best Non-Solvent – THC

Winner: Kimbo Kush (84.37%, dry sift) Cuban Tech from Exotic Genetics
Runner Up: Fire On the Mountain (82.68%) from NW Alchemy featuring Head Hunter
 
Best Non-Solvent – CBD

Winner: Remedy (52.5% CBD, 3390 ppm ethanol) by Hesperides Gardens
Runner Up: ACDC (13.41% CBD bubble hash) Loaded Soda by CO2 Organics
 
Edible Winners

 
Best Edible – Savory
Winner: Delux Nut Mix by Laurie and Marry Jane
Runner Up: Capitol Hill Peanut Butter
 
Best Edible – Sweet
Winner: Dark Chocolate Fudge by Mad Monster
Runner Up: Almond Bites by Laurie and Marry Jane
 
Best Edible – Drink
Winner: Loaded Soda Root Beer – 104.85 mg THC
Runner Up: Sensi Sweet Tropical Punch – 58.68 mg THC
 
Best Edible – CBD
Winner: Vanilla Truffles from The Bakeree – Cookie Fam Genetics
Runner Up: Slips by Oakor
 
Best Topical
Winner: Kush Cream Cherry Bomb – 2.01 mg THC
Runner Up: Liberty Lotion High CBD – 1.67 mg CBD
